entry.title: Reconsidering github
entry.summary: In August 2014, Jeff Garzik suggested a possible first step towards moving the primary repository for Bitcoin. He proposed putting the primary repo on bitcoin.org and then mirroring it to GitHub for each push. This would be a smaller first step than switching primaries and necessary before doing so.Bryan, who provided the email exchange, included a link to his personal website heybryan.org and his phone number.
